entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Snow beginning after midnight. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow changing to rain showers and ending near noon then cloudy. Snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 60 becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the morning then light in the afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. A few flurries beginning after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Sunday 29 January 2023
